sql.if: and scooter.product_name like concat('%', #{enter.keyword}, '%') or scooter.product_code like concat('%', #{enter.keyword}, '%')

mapper.select:
select scooter.id, scooter.product_name, scooter.product_code, scooter.specificat_id, specificattype.specificat_name, scooter.group_id, specificatgroup.group_name, scooter.color_id, color.color_name, color.color_value, scooter.sale_stutas from ope_sale_scooter scooter left join ope_specificat_type specificattype on scooter.specificat_id = specificattype.id left join ope_specificat_group specificatgroup on scooter.group_id = specificatgroup.id left join ope_color color on scooter.color_id = color.id where scooter.dr = 0
order by scooter.created_time desc limit #{enter.startRow},#{enter.pageSize}
